author: IANS
title: Twitter celebrates 20 years of 'DDLJ'
text:
On completion of 20 years of Shah Rukh Khan and Kajol-starrer “Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge” (DDLJ) on Tuesday, Twitter celebrated the Aditya Chopra directorial on the film's official page.
The “Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge” page on the micro-blogging site shows colourful balloons rising through the page.

The cult film also received greetings from the masses on the site. People tweeted with the hashtag #DDLJBestMovieEver, which has been trending in India.
To mark the film's 20-year completion, the makers also released a documentary titled "Making of DDLJ". The one-hour documentary features behind the scenes shots and interviews of the cast and crew.
“Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge”, which released on October 20, 1995, also featured Mandira Bedi, Anupam Kher, Amrish Puri and Farida Jalal.
